mapper.insert: insert into speciality(id, name, college_id) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{collegeId})
mapper.update: update speciality set name = #{name}, college_id = #{collegeId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select speciality.*,college.name as collegeName from speciality left join college on speciality.college_id=college.id
and speciality.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by speciality.id desc
